entrance_shaft.name: Entrance Shaft
entrance_shaft.description: Cold metal walls and a ladder far above.
entrance_shaft.notes: A note scratched into the metal: Do not trust the silence below.

old_platform.name: Old Platform
old_platform.description: Cracked tiles and a rusted locker.
old_platform.secret: One tile near the locker rocks slightly when you press your boot on it.
old_platform.notes: Faded chalk near the edge marks a circle and a simple arrow pointing down the line.

service_tunnel.name: Service Tunnel
service_tunnel.description: Pipes run along the ceiling with a faint hum.
service_tunnel.notes: Someone wrote on a pipe in marker: If you see it, do not freeze. Light drives it away.

side_passage.name: Side Passage
side_passage.description: A narrow path with damp stone and dripping water.
side_passage.notes: Rust flakes scatter over old boot prints that lead deeper, then vanish.

broken_step.name: Broken Step
broken_step.description: Half collapsed stairs leading deeper down.
broken_step.notes: A scrap of yellow tape hangs from the railing with the words DO NOT DESCEND barely visible.

drain_corridor.name: Drain Corridor
drain_corridor.description: Rusty grates and a low trickle of filthy water.
drain_corridor.notes: Old maintenance logs mention strange echoes reported here during night shifts.

filter_room.name: Filter Room
filter_room.description: Old machines stand still with dust layered thick.
filter_room.notes: A tag on a console reads: Track 6 anomaly logged, no fault found.

pump_station.name: Pump Station
pump_station.description: Large pumps sit quiet, each coated in soot.
pump_station.notes: Tools lie where they were dropped, as if work ended mid task and never resumed.

maintenance_hall.name: Maintenance Hall
maintenance_hall.description: Long hall with open panels and scattered tools.
maintenance_hall.secret: Behind a loose access panel, something heavy rests against the wall.
maintenance_hall.notes: A painted symbol of an eye has been scratched over many times near one open panel.

storage_bay.name: Storage Bay
storage_bay.description: Dusty shelves and empty crates line the walls.
storage_bay.notes: Stenciled letters on a crate read: EMERGENCY SUPPLY, but it is long since emptied.

junction_room.name: Junction Room
junction_room.description: Four corridors meet here with faded markings.
junction_room.notes: On the wall, someone has drawn a rough map of tracks and a single circle marked with a question mark.

deep_track.name: Deep Track
deep_track.description: An unused train track vanishes into darkness.
deep_track.notes: An old emergency flare case lies open here, one tube still intact inside.

rail_pit.name: Rail Pit
rail_pit.description: Loose stones and a drop in the middle of the floor.
rail_pit.notes: A note scratched into stone: It waits near the rails. Light makes it turn away.

signal_archive.name: Signal Archive
signal_archive.description: Shelves full of faded papers and cracked binders.
signal_archive.notes: Log entry: Repeated reports of a tall figure seen at the edge of lamplight along the outer track.

breaker_room.name: Breaker Room
breaker_room.description: Switchboards line the walls with chipped labels.
breaker_room.notes: Several switches are locked in the OFF position with wax and twine, as if someone did not trust them to stay down.

lower_pass.name: Lower Pass
lower_pass.description: A cold passage with dust floating in thin beams of light.
lower_pass.notes: Breath shows in front of you even when the air should be still.

echo_hall.name: Echo Hall
echo_hall.description: Every small step repeats itself again and again.
echo_hall.notes: Someone tried to cover their tracks here, but the dust remembers where they went.

cold_store.name: Cold Store
cold_store.description: Air feels sharper, as if something watches from corners.
cold_store.notes: A small data chip sits on a metal tray, tagged only with a code and the word anomaly.

cable_channel.name: Cable Channel
cable_channel.description: Thick bundled cables snake along the walls.
cable_channel.notes: Several cables have been cut and tied off, as if someone wanted less power down here, not more.

inspection_walk.name: Inspection Walk
inspection_walk.description: Metal grates clatter underfoot with each step.
inspection_walk.notes: The grating bears deep marks, as if something heavy was dragged toward the gate many times.

rust_gate.name: Rust Gate
rust_gate.description: A tall gate sealed with time and flakes of red metal.
rust_gate.notes: A strange key rests near the base of the gate, cold to the touch. The metal around the lock shows signs of heat and force from long ago.
